title: Max Scharf
text: I am currently a junior at Jericho High School, with courses and extracurricular activities centered around programming and engineering in business (4.00 unweighted GPA, 4.25 weighted GPA) transcript.

title: Max Scharf
text: I am currently a junior at Jericho High School, with courses and extracurricular activities centered around programming and engineering in business (4.00 unweighted GPA, 4.25 weighted GPA) transcript.

title: Max Scharf
text:
Research Interests

Interpretable Machine Learning
Computer Vision in Computational Biology
Bayesian Inference
Graph Machine Learning
Applications in Public Policy and Human-Computer Interactions

title: Max Scharf
text:
Current Research
Currently, I am working on a project related to Multi-modal deep learning applications to statistic model pipelines of Electronic Health Record (EHR) data. I am proficient in Python, R, SQL, and Java. I also speak conversational Mandarin.

title: Max Scharf
text:
Work Experience
I have worked as a data analyst for Duke Field Hockey and as an undergraduate TA in the Statistics department at Duke. I have also participated in several research projects and conferences.
